content:
Thunderbird is not available for iPads. And I can see where this process has gone wrong and gotten you stuck.

Sorry for the trouble. Please use the process documented at https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/donate/#faq to request a refund.
creator: wsmwk

content: I should add, there is plenty of ree space on the disk drive.
creator: mpshatz

content: I checked that I have write permissions on the files. Interestingly, the file system says both the Inbox data file and the .msf file were modified this evening, when I have been getting this error.
creator: mpshatz

content: I forgot to add "Repair folder" didn't help either

content: Please answer the question at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1520620#answer-1747090 and post there
creator: wsmwk

content:
Answering my own question as follows:

  1. 1 Press "Alt" key
  2. 2 Select "View" in menu bar
  3. 3 Select "Layout" in menu box
  4. 4 Select "Vertical View" in menu box
creator: mrc.6737
